verses.text: Ix sb'oanpax jun altar winhaj Bezaleel chi', aton jun b'aj stz'a silab'. D'a te' acacia ix sb'o winh. Lajannhej ix aj yechel schanhil pak'anh, chab' metro yet' 25 centímetro junjun pak'anh. Jun metro yet' 25 centímetro ix ajq'ue schaanhil.
Ix b'ojipaxq'ue chanhe' sch'aac t'a schiquintac schanhil, yaman ix aj yet' jun altar chi'. Ix pichchaj te' t'a q'uen bronce.
Masanil syamk'ab'il jun altar chi', nab'a bronce ix aji: Aton yet'tal b'aj tz'ik'chajel q'uen taanh, q'uen pala, q'uen nivac uk'ab', q'uen tenedor yet' yet'tal te' tzak'ak'.
Ix b'ojipax jun q'uen malla nab'a bronce, ix ak'jioch q'uen t'a yalanh sti' t'a yool. D'a snanhal jun altar chi' ix och q'ueen.
Ix b'opax chanhe' argolla nab'a bronce, ix och t'a junjun yesquinail q'uen malla chi'. Ix elk'och q'uen t'a spatic jun altar chi', ha t'a yol q'uen tzek' te' sb'achlab'il.
Ix b'opax sb'achlab'il jun altar chi' t'a te' acacia, ix ochpax q'uen bronce t'a spatictac te'.
Ix ecchajek' te' t'a yol q'uen argolla ayoch t'a stz'eytac jun altar chi' yic syal sb'achchaji. Ha jun altar chi', chemte' ix och t'ay, ix kan yolanil t'a yool.
Ha yet' q'uen nen nab'a bronce sk'an eb' ix ix ayoch yilumaloc sti' k'apac mantiado, a yet' q'uen ix sb'o jun niwan palangana winhaj Bezaleel yet' sb'achnub'al yich.
Ix sb'opax k'apac cortina winhaj Bezaleel yic tz'och smaculoc spatictac amak' t'a scajnub' Dios. Ha t'a stojolal sur, ix och 45 metro k'apac cortina chi', aton ch'al lino b'ayb'il ayoch t'a k'apac.
Ix b'opax 20 yoyal yet' 20 pax sb'achnub'al yich nab'a bronce. Axo t'a schon te' ix em juntzanh q'uen q'ueen nab'a plata yet' yargollail.
Ix b'opax k'apac cortina yic stojolal norte, 45 metro k'apac yet' 20 oy yet' pax sb'achnub'al yich nab'a bronce yet' q'uen ayem t'a schon yoyal nab'a plata yet' yargollail.
Ix b'opax k'apac cortina yic stojolal b'aj tz'em k'u, 22 metro yet' nanhalxo sat k'apac yet' lajunhe' yoyal yet' pax sb'achnub'al yich yet' q'uen ayem t'a schon yoyal nab'a plata yet' yargollail.
Anhejtona' t'a stojolal b'aj sq'ueul k'u, 22 metro yet' nanhalxo sat, ix b'opax k'apac cortina yic tz'och t'ay.
Ha t'a jun pak'anh b'aj tzonh ochi, ay uque' metro k'apac cortina ayochi yet' oxe' yoyal yet' pax sb'achnub'al yich.
Axo pax t'a junxo pak'anh, ay pax uque' metro k'apac yet' oxe' yoyal yet' pax sb'achnub'al yich.
Masanil juntzanh k'apac cortina chi', ch'al lino b'ayb'il ayoch t'a k'apac.
Masanil pax sb'achnub'al yich oy chi', nab'a bronce ix aji. Axo q'uen ayem t'a schon oy chi' nab'a plata yet' yargollail.

Ha k'apac cortina ix och smaculoc sti' amak' chi', nanhal sb'alunhil metro sat k'apac, haxo steel k'apac, chab' metro yet' 25 centímetro. B'ob'ilpaxoch yelvanub' k'apac, jalb'il t'a anh ch'al k'ik'mutz'inac, anh ch'al yaxmaquinac, anh chac ch'al yet' pax lino ch'al b'ayb'il. Lajannhej yet' masanil k'apac ayoch t'a amak'.
Ay chanhe' yoyal yet' chanhe' sb'achnub'al yich nab'a bronce, haxo q'uen ayem t'a schon yoyal, nab'a plata yet' yargollail.
Masanil yestacail scajnub' Dios chi' yet' yic k'apac cortina ayoch t'a spatictac amak', nab'a bronce.

Ix yalanxi winhaj Moisés chi' to sb'o slistail jantac q'uen oro, q'uen plata yet' q'uen bronce ix och t'a scajnub' Jehová, aton b'aj sik'chaj scaxail trato. Ha eb' levita ixb’o’an slistail chi'. Ha winhaj Itamar yuninal winhaj Aarón ix cuchb'an eb'.
Ha winhaj Bezaleel, yuninal winhaj Uri, yixchiquin winhaj Hur, yinhtilal Judá ixb’o’an masanil tastac ix yal Jehová t'a winhaj Moisés to sb'oi.

Axo winhaj Aholiab yuninal winhaj Ahisamac, yinhtilal Dan ix kolwaj yet' winhaj Bezaleel chi'. Ha winhaj Aholiab chi' tenum q'ueen winh, jalum k'apac winh, syalpax sb'oanoch yelvanub' yet' anh ch'al k'ik'mutz'inac winh, anh ch'al yaxmaquinac, anh chac ch'al yet' anh lino ch'al te wach'.

Masanil q'uen oro ix k'anchaji yic ix b'o scajnub' Dios, t'a ofrendail ix aj smoljiem q'ueen. Ha q'uen oro chi', 21 quintal yet' 95 libraxo q'ueen, icha yalil q'uen echlab' sk'anchaj t'a scajnub' Dios.
Axo q'uen plata ix molchajemi, a ix ik'chajq'ue vaan sb'isul eb' anima, 75 quintal yet' chab'xo arroba q'ueen, icha yalil q'uen echlab' sk'anchaj t'a scajnub' Dios.
Masanil eb' vinac ix tz'ib'chaji, eb' 20 ab'ilxo sk'inal, 603 mil yet' 550 eb' t'a smasanil. Junjun eb' chi' nanhal siclo plata ix yak' eb', icha yalil q'uen echlab' sk'anchaj t'a scajnub' Dios.

Ha q'uen plata ix och t'a sb'achnub'al yich smarcoal yet' sb'achnub'oc yoyal b'aj tz'och k'apac cortina, 75 quintal q'ueen t'a smasanil. Masanil juntzanh q'uen plata chi' ix och t'a cien sb'achnub'al chi', syalelk'ochi 75 libra ix och t'a junjun.
Ha yet' chab'xo arroba plata chi' ix sb'o q'uen gancho winhaj Bezaleel ix och t'a te' oy yet' smacul sjolom oy chi' yet' q'uen argolla.
Masanil q'uen bronce ix ak'chaj ofrendail t'a Jehová, ay am 53 quintal yet' lajunhexo libra q'ueen.

Ha t'a q'uen bronce chi' ix b'o sb'achnub'al yich yoyal b'aj ix kan sti' mantiado b'aj sch'ox sb'ha Dios. Anhejtona' t'a q'uen ix b'o jun altar nab'a bronce yet' pax smallail. Nab'a bronce smasanil syamk'ab'il jun altar chi',
yet' pax sb'achnub'al yich yoyal smacul spatictac amak' yet' yestacail oyanoch t'a scajnub' Dios yet' yestacail spatictac yamaq'uil cajnub' chi'.
